entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -15.8°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 72 %

Dewpoint: -19.7°C

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Risk of snow squalls late in the morning and in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
